alert.note: Alert for Ford; Iroquois; Kankakee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 2:29PM CST until January 10 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST /7 PM EST/ THIS EVENING TO 4 AM CST /5 AM EST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and hazardous travel conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Illinois and northwest Indiana. * WHEN...From 6 PM CST /7 PM EST/ this evening to 4 AM CST /5 AM EST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest wind gusts expected near the Lake Michigan shore. Travel will be difficult for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Illinois, the latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com. In Indiana, the latest road conditions for Indiana are available by calling 1-800-261-7623.
